title: The Two Lives of Ezekiel Van Cleef: A Steampunk Mystery
description: Fritz Napoleon Smith always thought death was the end. But when the man responsible for his father's death appears to have risen from the dead, questions abound. As the editor for the World Chronicle, the largest newspaper in the world, Fritz sets out on the adventure of a lifetime to catch this elusive criminal, and finally get the answer to what happens when we die.
author: Jimpson J Bird
